entry.title: 0.8.2 branch
entry.summary: On Thursday, May 30, 2013, a user named grarpamp suggested that a new branch should be created at v0.8.2 to include critical fixes without needing to track post-release changes. In response, Luke announced that he would create the 0.8.x branch in the coming weeks. The stable branches are available on Gitorious for now.
